allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Multi-agent research system tutorial

This tutorial teaches users to build a coordinated team of AI agents
using Claude Code that analyzes academic research papers.

Features:
- 4 specialized agents (orchestrator, researcher, copywriter, antagonist)
- Automatic PDF data extraction
- Statistical analysis (correlation, Fisher z-transformation)
- Professional article writing with citations
- Quality review and revision loops

Includes:
- Complete skill definitions in .claude/skills/
- Python tools for PDF and statistical analysis
- MCP configuration for secure file access
- Comprehensive documentation (README, RUN-PROJECT, CLAUDE.md)
- Tutorial improvement recommendations (revisions.md)
- Example outputs from successful workflow run

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
